channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Some Democrats scouring their finances for fear of a Trump prosecution: "No one is safe"
item.description: Some congressional Democrats are going so far as to check their own personal finances after the indictment of James Comey , Axios has learned. Why it ...

item.title: Tropical Storm Imelda to threaten Carolinas with heavy rains
item.description: Tropical Storm Imelda formed Sunday, joining the monster Hurricane Humberto in the Atlantic, and forecasters warned it'll likely bring heavy rains to ...

item.title: Behind the Curtain: 3 titanic shifts hitting America at once
item.description: Feeling more anxious? More unsure? Unless you're heavily sedated, you should be: We've never witnessed so many population-wide shifts simultaneously i...

item.title: Trump plans to squeeze Netanyahu to sign Gaza peace deal, aides say
item.description: President Trump's meeting with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Monday could boil down to a binary choice: Accept my plan for ending the w...

item.title: Where coffee prices are rising the most
item.description: Data: Toast ; Map: Alex Fitzpatrick/Axios Coffee prices rose in almost every U.S. state over the last year, per new Toast data shared with Axios. Why ...

item.title: New York Mayor Eric Adams ends reelection bid
item.description: The incumbent was polling behind several other candidates, including the Democratic nominee and front-runner Zohran Mamdani.

item.title: Oregon sues Trump administration over order to deploy troops in Portland
item.description: The defense secretary issued a memo saying 200 members of the Oregon National Guard would be activated, an action state leaders say is unlawful.

item.title: Is Trump keeping all his promises? This MAGA couple doesn’t think so.
item.description: Eight months into his second term, the president is facing some difficulties living up to the high expectations of his supporters.

item.title: A plan to send troops to Portland remains riddled with uncertainties
item.description: Federal law places strict limits on using soldiers for law enforcement. President Trump is pushing those limits. How much courts may push back remains...

item.title: Democrats, Republicans dig in ahead of Trump meeting on funding bill
item.description: The two sides appear to be at a stalemate as Democratic leaders seek negotiations, while Republicans want to push through a funding bill passed by the...

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
